segments.text: I need to go to the bank .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Closed ? Are you kidding ? What is it , some kind of holiday today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you already forgotten ? What's the date today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it's the first of April , April fool's day
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You forgot all about it , didn't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So I have , but I has reminded me at least one thing I need to remember .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Better not forget that , so kill you if you don't get her something .
segments.speaker: S2
